$PKKFF I'm a happy shareholder. I love that they give ordinary shareholders the option to ask a question and not just the professional analysts who sometimes hardly have a clue or don't ask the question that everyone is waiting for.
JJ definitely has big plans for Peak and I am very excited to see where he will take us.
One thing I would like is to see more structure in presenting the financials
created_at: because at times it was a bit hard to follow imo. But then again they do speak for themselves.

If you look at the mid quarter report
created_at: it looks like Peak only had about 21 million in transactions that they earn a fee on. With the Chinese holiday ending mid Feb
column3: that means most of the revenues reported for the first qtr came late Feb and March. This leads me to believe the 2nd qtr numbers could be quite shocking.  Maybe we‚Äôll get more clarity on this on the call. Any thoughts?
